name: The Long Bridge Home
description:
Made for the 2021 Global Game Jam in 48 hours, under the theme: "Lost and Found"

Lost in the woods, a lone bear cub is searching for it's mother. The forest's fireflies are here to help, building bridges for the bear to cross in the day, then guiding the bear across the bridge in the night.

As the firefly, it is your job to select the bridge pieces, rotate them, and set them down to create a bridge, for the bear to get to the next path. You must then guide the bear across this bridge, closer back to its mother.

Sometimes there may be more fireflies along the way to join the bear, and other times there may be rocks to avoid with the bridge.

Controls:

BUILD MODE:
Click and Drag a piece to move it.
R to rotate while dragging.
Right Click to remove a piece.

PLAY MODE:
WASD to move the firefly around, and the bear will follow.
You cannot adjust the bridge while the bear is on it.
